review: I consulted Dr Komala for the first time, happy to share my experience. She is very friendly yet professional, had patience to listen to all my concerns and queries, answered them in simple language, approachable and highly recommend her.

Doctor is very good and understanding..very calmly she listens and solves our problem.. half of my problem was resolved after mam makes us understand regarding any issue.  feels good to be in good hands.
comfortable chat.  very understanding. it's good that I can suggest her . thanks for the best suggestion

I am very happy to have Dr komala M P. he was very caring! he explained everything so I could understand.it is very helpful to be able to get on oppointment. best family doctor ever. we are treated like family.
Very understanding, experienced and learned doctor. I will Strongly recommend her. Happy with her consultation.
